messages.title.classes: Programming languages: C and Scratch for bringing models to life
messages.text.intro: Dive into the future of robotics with our comprehensive masterclasses covering Lego, Tinkercad and 3D printing, Arduino programming with C programming language and circuit design
messages.text.Welcome to the exciting world of in: Welcome to the exciting world of innovations!
messages.text.Our courses are designed to introdu: Our courses are designed to introduce you to the basics of programming and robotics, unleash your creativity through 3D design.
messages.text.Whether you're coding your first pr: Whether you're coding your first program, programming a robot to navigate challenges, or bringing your ideas to life with 3D modeling, we are here to guide you every step of the way.
Let's start this journey together. Dream, design, and develop with no bounds!
messages.text.Our goal is to make studying compre: Our goal is to make studying comprehensive topics simple and exciting
messages.text.All the amazing things that surroun: All the amazing things that surround us are made by humans, and only this fact might make you curious and wish to know:  "How does it works, how it is made and how could I use it"
messages.text.And we can inspire you to explore a: And we can inspire you to explore and study this unbelievable natural and closely related to it man-made world
messages.funlab-description: provides robotic, programming, electronic circuit design, 3d design and printing courses in Vilanova i la Geltrú
messages.smileschool-description: Math, programming and Lego engineering courses in Barcelona
messages.cookie-consent-statement: We and selected third parties use cookies or similar technologies for technical purposes and, with your consent, for other purposes to enhance your experience.
messages.cookie-consent-action-point: Use the “Accept” button to consent. Use the “Reject” button to continue without accepting.
messages.news.funlab-partnership: Promising partnership with Funlab and Smile School
